biography_text: DAVIDSON, Warren, a Representative from Ohio; born in Ohio, March 1, 1970; graduated from Sidney High School, Sidney, Ohio, 1989; B.A., United States Military Academy, West Point, N.Y., 1995; M.B.A., University of Notre Dame, Notre Dame, Ind.; United States Army; business owner; Concord Township, Ohio, trustee; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fourteenth Congress, by special election, to fill the vacancy caused by the resignation of United States Representative John Andrew Boehner, and reelected to the succeeding Congress (June 7, 2016-present).
